Description: Security Vulnerability in a Web Browser
Solution: update the browser to the latest available version

Description: Command Injection Vulnerability in a Mail Server
Solution: apply a security patch provided by the mail server provider to fix the vulnerability

Description: Authentication Bypass Vulnerability in a Mobile Application
Solution: release an update to the mobile application that fixes the vulnerability

Description: Denial of Service (DoS) Vulnerability in a File Server
Solution: update the file server with a security patch

Description: Weak Authentication Vulnerability in a Web Application
